程序包 com.geometry.service

类 Bonus1

java.lang.Object
com.geometry.service.Bonus1
public class Bonus1 extends Object
Business logic for Bonus1 - Compound Area Calculation Challenge. This class manages a timed challenge where students solve complex area problems involving compound shapes. Features include time limits, multiple attempts, unit conversion awareness, and progressive scoring.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Bonus1

      public Bonus1()
      Constructor for Bonus1 task. Initializes the question pool with randomized order.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setCurrentQuestion

      public void setCurrentQuestion(int questionNumber)
      Set a specific question as the current challenge.
      参数:
      questionNumber - Question number (1-9)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if question number is out of valid range

    • startNewQuestion

      public boolean startNewQuestion()
      Start a new question from the remaining pool. Initializes the question and starts the timer.
      返回:
      true if there are questions remaining, false if all questions are completed

    • checkAnswer

      public Bonus1.Result checkAnswer(double userAnswer, String unit)
      Check the user's answer for correctness. Validates both the numerical value and the unit. Awards points based on remaining attempts if correct.
      参数:
      userAnswer - User's numerical answer
      unit - User's unit choice ("cm2" or "m2")
      返回:
      Result enum indicating CORRECT, INCORRECT, or MAX_ATTEMPTS_REACHED

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Stop the current timer if running.

    • getTimeRemainingFormatted

      public String getTimeRemainingFormatted()
      Get remaining time formatted as "MM:SS".
      返回:
      Formatted time string (e.g., "04:30" for 4 minutes 30 seconds)

    • getCurrentQuestion

      public CompoundArea getCurrentQuestion()
      Get the current compound area question.
      返回:
      Current CompoundArea object

    • getTimeRemaining

      public int getTimeRemaining()
      Get remaining time in seconds.
      返回:
      Seconds remaining for current question

    • getAttempts

      public int getAttempts()
      Get number of attempts made for current question.
      返回:
      Current attempt count

    • getRemainingQuestionsCount

      public int getRemainingQuestionsCount()
      Get count of remaining questions.
      返回:
      Number of questions left to solve

    • getCurrentQuestionFormattedArea

      public String getCurrentQuestionFormattedArea()
      Get formatted correct answer for current question.
      返回:
      Formatted area string with unit, or empty string if no current question

    • getCurrentQuestionUnit

      public String getCurrentQuestionUnit()
      Get the expected unit for current question.
      返回:
      Unit string ("cm2" or "m2"), or empty string if no current question
